Tribute page to Laxman Pai

Laxman Pai

Indian Artist and Painter

Information about the artist

  • Born on 21 January 1926
  • Died on 14 March 2021 (aged 95)
  • Principal of the Goa College of Art (1977-1987)
  • Received India's third highest civilian honour of Padma Bsushan.
  • Known for: Contemporary paintings
  • Wife: Purnima Pai
  • Children: 1
  • Website: laxmanpai.com

If you want to read more about Laxman Pai's life, visit this Wikipedia page.
